title: A Guest in a Ghost House - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Drama   Harem   Horror   Mature   Mystery   Psychological   Supernatural
tags: Curious Protagonist   Dark   Family   Friendship   Ghosts   Investigations   Male Protagonist   Seeing Things Other Humans Can't   Shameless Protagonist   Unlucky Protagonist   Weak Protagonist
author: 强大的猪
description: I’ve been receiving 3 creepy pictures in the mail every three days. After setting off to find the source, I found myself trapped living in a ghost house. The more answers I get, the more questions I have. What did I do to deserve this?>
